metadata.title: CVE-2019-20093 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad function in PdfVariant.h in PoDoFo 0.9.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file, because of ImageExtractor.cpp.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
